root.name: Alternative World Games
root.description: OverviewAlternative World Games is an Olympic style game developed and published by Gremlin Interactive for the ZX Spectrum and Commodore 64 platforms.GameplaySportsIn Alternative World Games there are eight playable sports.Sack RacePlate BalanceBoot TossRiver JumpPole ClimbWall RunPillow FightPogo Stick
